actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, S. Rept. 94-286.
Senate vitiated its action on indefinite postponement.
Cloture motion filed in Senate on motion to consider.
Cloture motion failed of passage in Senate, roll call #355 (54-38).
Placed on calendar in Senate under "Subjects on the Table".

official_title: Submission of a resolution expressing disapproval of the President's proposal to decontrol the price of domestic crude oil.

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, S. Rept. 94-286) States the disagreement and disapproval of the Senate to the amendments to the pricing and allocations regulations promulgated under the Emergency Petroleum Allocation Act proposed by the President for the purpose of decontrolling old domestic crude oil over a 30-month period and establishing a ceiling price for all uncontrolled domestic crude oil.

titles.title: Submission of a resolution expressing disapproval of the President's proposal to decontrol the price of domestic crude oil.
